queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:giftreg_descriptions` ( `object_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `object_type` char(1) NOT NULL default 'F', `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL default 'EN', PRIMARY KEY (`object_id`,`object_type`,`lang_code`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:giftreg_event_products` ( `item_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `event_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `product_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `amount` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `ordered_amount` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `extra` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`item_id`,`event_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:giftreg_events` ( `event_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `user_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `start_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `end_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', `type` char(1) NOT NULL default 'P', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `owner` varchar(128) NOT NULL default '', `email` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `company_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`event_id`), KEY `start_date` (`start_date`,`end_date`,`type`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:giftreg_field_variants` ( `variant_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `field_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `position` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`variant_id`), KEY `field_id` (`field_id`), KEY `position` (`position`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:giftreg_fields` ( `field_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `field_type` char(1) NOT NULL default 'I', `position` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `required` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`field_id`), KEY `position` (`position`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
REPLACE INTO ?:privilege_descriptions (privilege, description, lang_code, section_id) VALUES ('view_events', 'View events', 'EN', '1');
REPLACE INTO ?:privilege_descriptions (privilege, description, lang_code, section_id) VALUES ('manage_events', 'Manage events', 'EN', '1');

REPLACE INTO ?:privilege_descriptions (privilege, description, lang_code, section_id) VALUES ('manage_events', 'Управление событиями', 'RU', '1');
DELETE FROM ?:privileges WHERE privilege LIKE 'view_events' OR privilege LIKE 'manage_events'
DELETE FROM ?:privilege_descriptions WHERE privilege LIKE 'view_events' OR privilege LIKE 'manage_events'
